exampleProjects: In my ECE 196 Engineering Hands-On Project course, I was lead programmer for our team project. I worked with two electrical engineers to develop a product called FreshFridge that involved hardware and software connections to support our communities. We developed a storage container that could detect the spoilage of food using gas sensors, and deliver the sensors determinations in real time to the website I developed.
Screenshot of the FreshFridge project page displaying the health status of a banana.

In my ECE 196 Engineering Hands-On Project course, I was lead programmer for our team project. I worked with two electrical engineers to develop a product called FreshFridge that involved hardware and software connections to support our communities. We developed a storage container that could detect the spoilage of food using gas sensors, and deliver the sensors determinations in real time to the website I developed.
